tooltip.phone: Or simply give me a call

about.title: Me, Myself and I
about.description: They say oh my God I see the way you shine, Take your hand, my dear, and place them both in mine, You know you stopped me dead while I was passing by, And now I beg to see you dance just one more time

projects.description: They say oh my God I see the way you shine, Take your hand, my dear, and place them both in mine, You know you stopped me dead while I was passing by, And now I beg to see you dance just one more time

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you want to get in touch with me, regarding a project or any random question, you can send me a message through the form.

name.length: Name must be less than 10 characters

message.length: Message must be at least 10 characters
